docs.title: Tip Calculator
docs.text: This web app is a simple tip calculator that allows you to enter the total bill amount and the tip percentage. It then calculates the total amount to be paid, including the tip, and displays the result in a user-friendly format.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository.
  2. Open index.html on your browser.
  3. Enter input values, click the Calculate button and that's it.
